Description: Pratesi Womens Italian Leather Radica Cimabue Top Handle Business Tote Briefcase in Mustard The Cimabue in Radica Range Collection is the perfect brief purse with the ultimate blend of femininity and assertiveness. Items are hand colored to perfection through traditional process of finest full-grain vegetable tanned Italian leather. Made with automatic walker closure, accordion side for expansion , interior zippered section for laptops up to 16 inches, two pen holders, elastic smart phone holder, adjustable/removable shoulder strap, detachable LED light insert. Garment dust bag included. From the Radica Range Collection, this product is handmade in the Florence region of Italy, tanned with a special technique that uses only natural ingredients and pigmented with a lacquer to achieve the patent leather with coats the leather for protection and gives a smooth, clean and glossy finish. The Laptop Bag made with automatic walker closure, accordion side for expansion Features interior zippered section for laptops up to 16 inches, two pen holders, elastic smart phone holder Comes with carry handles and adjustable/removable shoulder strap for carrying easy Dimensions: 15.5 (L) x 4 (W) x 11 (H) in.
